https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ybPHPOyIrTd00N3P9CXV3xMq9Is.jpg An hour-long BBC documentary (part of the acclaimed "This World" series) which explores link between heavy metal music (specifically death and black metal) and Satanism and murder. Death Metal Murders
